conclusion: Plan to analyze the image to understand flow paths through baffles and determine which container liquid will flow into.
Image shows containers A-G with arrows indicating liquid flow; A-D have arrows pointing to baffles connecting to E-G.
Identify containers from which liquid will flow: A, B, C, and D.
Observe arrows pointing from containers A, B, C, and D to the baffles.
Note connections between baffles and containers E, F, and G.
Determine flow path for container A: connects to E.
Determine flow path for container B: connects to F.
Determine flow path for container C: connects to G.
Determine flow path for container D: connects to E.
Predict which container the liquid will flow into after passing through the baffles: E.
